labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Endless" is an all-in-one platform focused on collaboration, content transformation, and content creation. Based on the available tools ("get-alerts" and "get-forecast"), the primary use case appears to be weather-related information retrieval. This suggests that the server may be part of a larger platform offering various services, with weather data being one of the functionalities. The tools indicate the ability to fetch real-time weather alerts and forecasts, which are typically used for weather monitoring and planning purposes.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is "Weather" because the available tools are directly related to weather data retrieval. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" is chosen because fetching weather data often involves querying external APIs or databases, which aligns with research-oriented functionalities. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

tools.name: get-alerts
tools.description: Get weather alerts for a state

tools.name: get-forecast
tools.description: Get weather forecast for a location

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@makingendless/endless-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
